page.title: 13Survey from Castle Rock
page.content: When we carried out our survey for the{Domesday Project}we started out from school (456148)at 1.10pm on Wednesday afternoon 5th.June in the year A.D.1985.We went south-east along the Warren Hills Road (B587) past the {Bull's Head Pub}to{Upper Greenhill {Farm.}By that time we were looking at our maps and writing the codes for what the fields contained.At (472138) we turned south-west along the footpath to{Kellam's Farm.}From here we carried on through fields until we reached some woodland at (465127) where we turned south-east again and through a meadow with several ponies in -which we stopped and stroked- past {Old Rise Rocks}and{Rise Rocks Farm} until we met the B591 near{Poplar {Farm.}Turning north-east we went about 500 metres then took a right turn down a side road to the Motorway.
